data.name: ReadCase
data.value: select top(1) NUMB, STATUS from CKT_CASE where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCaseUnit
data.value: select CU_NUMBER, START_DATE, CLOSURE_DATE, CAS_NO, CSP_NO_AR, CSP_NO_AP, CSP_NO_CHILD from CKT_CASE_UNIT where (@cspNoAp = CSP_NO_AP) or (@cspNoAp = CSP_NO_AR) or (@cspNoAp = CSP_NO_CHILD)

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadInterstateRequest
data.value: select top(1) IDENTIFIER, KS_CASE_IND, CAS_I_NUMBER from CKT_INTERSTAT_RQST where @casINumber = CAS_I_NUMBER
